front.title: Problem statement of Inter-domain Traffic Redirection Risks

abstract.t: Redirection of network traffic on the Internet is a common technology. In operator network, there are complex scenarios, such as multi-domain interconnection and large scale network topology. Typo, limitation of out-of-band tool capabilities for configuration verification, network adjustment or failure may cause risks, such as traffic detour, traffic exposure, traffic black hole and traffic loops. This draft describes these risks.
